root.name: The Premiership
root.description: OverviewThe Premiership is a soccer management game developed and published by Codemasters for DOS in 1994.GameplayWhen the game is started up the player has the option to choose either the normal league or the super league. Playing the game works much like other soccer management games. The player can choose to sign new players, pick teams from available players, train players, check stats and finances, and play the team in a league. TeamsThere are 20 different selectable teams:EvertonLiverpoolSouthamptonChelseaArsenalNorwichSpursSheff. UnitedCoventryLeeds UTD.Aston VillaMan. UnitedMan. CityQ.P.RWest HamWimbledonSheff. Wed.NewcastleOldhamBlackburn

similar_games.game: The F.A. Premier League Football Manager 2001
